Docker Containers

  • Portable (anything, anywhere)
  • Low resource usage (VMs are obese)
  • Scalable (itâ€™s not 1999)
  • Isolation (processes)
  • Self-sufficient (no infrastructure dependencies)
  • Immutable (laptop > staging > production)
